about.subtitle: Get To Know
about.title: About Me
about.content1: My name is Arkadiusz Zygan. In 2019, I decided to systematize my coding and programming knowledge. Over the years, I was interested in new technologies, but I did not obtain full theoretical knowledge and did not implement practical projects. I decided to change that. Since then, I have been systematically learning front-end programming with back-end elements.
about.content2: I completed an intensive 9-month programming course under the supervision of an individual mentor - Bootcamp Web Developer Plus at Kodilla. I also participated in Javascript, React and Data science training courses on the Udemy. I constantly observes changes in trends, using many thematic channels on youtube (including Dev Ed - huge knowledge and contagious optimism of the author, Web Dev Simplified - a mine of information, DesignCourse - professionally and specifically on design).
about.content3: “Practice Makes Perfect” - we've all heard that once in our lives. Agree, but I believe that it is necessary to add ”conscious practice” - Anders Ericsson. Beware that 10,000 hours to achieve a high level in research as well. I realize there is still a lot of work ahead of me. I practice and develop skills in Javascript, React, HTML5 and css / sass. I know that I am at the beginning of this path, but I am motivated to add more steps.
